entities.description: Different response categories related to survey questions
Frequency count of responses in the dataset without any statistical weighting
Percentage representation of responses in the dataset
Type of the variable, such as numeric
Range of missing values for the survey question
Numbering associated with the sequence of victim-related responses

relationships.description: Associates a survey question with its different response categories
Associates a response category with its unweighted frequency count
Associates a response category with its percentage representation
Associates a survey question with its variable type
Associates a survey question with its range of missing values
Associates a survey question with its victim sequence number
